Name: Dal Makhni
Desc: Dal Makhni is a delicious,rich lentil dish with creamy flavour.

Name: Malai kofta
Desc: Malai kofta is made of fried dumpling balls with cream,usually they are made of mashed potatoes.

Name: Samosa
Desc: A samosa is a fried pastry with savoury filling of potatoes,onions and peas.It is served with one or two different dippings.

Name: Dosa
Desc: A dosa is a cooked flat thin layered rice batter with black gram.

Name: Matar Paneer
Desc: Matar paneer is a vegetarian North Indian dish consist of paneer and peas in a tomato based sauce.

Name: Veg Biryani
Desc: This is a mixed rice dish with its origins as indian continental.

Name: Chole Bhature
Desc: Chole bhature is an exquisite meal that is usually found in north indian roadside eateries.

Name: Idli sambar
Desc: Idli is a type of savoury rice cake which are made by steaming a batter.

Name: Sarson ka saag
Desc: Sarson ka saag is a popular dish from the Punjab region of South Asia.It is made from mustard greens and spices.
